AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: plantation owner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] once owned a bustling moon sugar cane plantation. Many slaves passed through [PAWN_possessive] plantation, all of them equally disgusting vermin.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: netch rancher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on a netch ranch for many years. [PAWN_pronoun] suffered many stings during these years, and learnt some basic medical skills in the process.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: kwama egg miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked tirelessly in a kwama egg mine for a considerable number of years. In this time [PAWN_pronoun] harvested many kwama eggs, and may have even kept a few as souvenirs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: silt strider trainer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] raised silt striders from nymph to adult. It was good work, until the red year arrived. Sadly, [PAWN_pronoun] was unable to save any silt strider eggs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: volcanic glass miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent many years working in the glass mines around Red Mountain. [PAWN_pronoun] always thought glass was fascinating to look at, and always wanted to keep some for [PAWN_possessive]self.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: volcanic ebony miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent what felt like decades working in the Vassir-Didanat ebony mine. In reality it was only months. These months, for better or worse, took a toll on [PAWN_possessive] body.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: marked by the Morag Tong
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] may have 'borrowed' from a shop keeper in Vivec City. Turns out the shop keeper knew someone rather high up in the Morag Tong. Now [PAWN_nameDef] has fled for [PAWN_possessive] life to lands unknown, hoping that the Morag Tong won't follow.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: skooma seller
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had the brilliant idea of starting [PAWN_possessive] own skooma buisness, a bustling market with profit margins most could only dream of. After a run in with an Ordinator, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to sample [PAWN_possessive] own product, leaving the past few years a blur.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: bonemold smith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was always fascinated with the process of constructing armor from bonemold. Following their lifelong dream, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to become one of the best bonemold smiths in Vivec. Sadly, [PAWN_possessive] fledgling business was in Camonna Tong territory. [PAWN_nameDef] barely saw a sliver of gold for [PAWN_possessive] hard work, but that never stopped [PAWN_possessive] from enjoying life.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: scuttle cook
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has always maintained that [PAWN_pronoun] invented scuttle, due to [PAWN_possessive] dislike of insect meat. Everyone around [PAWN_objective] knew it was a lie, but the scuttle was very tasty, so they feigned belief in [PAWN_nameDef] anyway.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: rat trainer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: One day [PAWN_nameDef] woke up and decided that [PAWN_pronoun] would train pack rats. Over [PAWN_possessive] years working in this emerging industry, [PAWN_pronoun] made a surprising amount of gold. Turns out rats are rather easy to train, and even easier to breed. And when times were tough, [PAWN_nameDef] always had something to eat.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ghostfence maintainer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent quite a few years maintaining the Great Ghostfence, a difficult, but highly rewarding job. It was a bittersweet moment when the Ghostfence was lowered. While [PAWN_nameDef] knew that the blight was gone, [PAWN_nameDef] also knew [PAWN_pronoun] was about to become unemployed.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: steel smith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a master of steel, and made a small fortune selling steel armaments. [PAWN_possessive] blades adorned the hips of many Dunmer nobles.\n\nOf course this all came to an end when a competitor emerged. This may not have been a problem for [PAWN_nameDef], except that [PAWN_possessive] competitor forged Akaviri style blades. Soon [PAWN_nameDef] was left with only a pouch half-full of drakes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: scrib trainer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] ran the most prestigious scrib circus in Mournhold. Dozens of Dunmer strolled past every day, completely oblivious to the supposed performance mere metres from them.\n\nOf course [PAWN_nameDef] was equally oblivious to the lack of attention, and simply enjoyed watching [PAWN_possessive] scrib shake their abdomens.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: slaughterfish eradicator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a group tasked with clearing the Vivec canals of slaughterfish. Many slaughterfish were slain, and many members of the group were lost to their jaws. But [PAWN_nameDef] managed to survive the ordeal.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: slaughterfish eradicator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a group tasked with clearing the Vivec canals of slaughterfish. Many slaughterfish were slain, and many members of the group were lost to their jaws. But [PAWN_nameDef] managed to survive the ordeal, albeit missing a leg.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: vivec gondolier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the many gondoliers working in the Vivec canals, and spent many days transporting Dunmer, and some n'wah, between the cantons. Whilst [PAWN_nameDef] found the job enjoyable, [PAWN_pronoun] was always annoyed watching all the potential customers simply walk past, and over a bridge to the next canton.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: ash yam farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Back in Vvardenfell [PAWN_nameDef] had a magnificent ash yam farm. The products of [PAWN_possessive] hard labour fed many slaves, up until a herd of wild guar decided they were hungry.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] slew every last guar that was even remotely close to [PAWN_possessive] farm. Of course this simply attracted a flock of cliff racers, and [PAWN_nameDef]'s farm was soon uninhabitable.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: bloat farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] once worked in one of the largest bloatspore mines in Vvardenfell. The days were spent harvesting bloat, expanding caves, and sometimes even building supports or platforms. Of course this all came to an end during the blight.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: wickwheat farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] early adulthood working in a wickwheat farm in the Grazelands. Many long days were spent under the blazing sun, sowing, harvesting, and shooting arrows at cliff racers. [PAWN_nameDef] finally had enough of the constant interruptions, and decided to look for a life somewhere else.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: marshmerrow farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on one of the marshmerrow plantations in the Ascadian Isles. Harvesting marshmerrow was hard work, but at the end of the day [PAWN_nameDef] earnt a sizable puch of drakes, and even got to keep some marshmerrow to cook up for snacks.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: kresh weed farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: One day [PAWN_nameDef] decided to start [PAWN_possessive] own business selling kresh fiber clothing. This proved to be significantly more difficult than [PAWN_nameDef] anticipated. Not only was kresh weed suprisingly difficult to grow, but good slaves were rather expensive, and harvesting kresh fiber was a laborious process.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: muck scooper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent slightly too much of [PAWN_possessive] life scooping muck out of muck sponges. At the end of every day, [PAWN_nameDef] was covered in a thick layer of muck. The only natural response to this daily occurrence was to never clean again.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: guar rancher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to work on a guar ranch back in Vvardenfell. Many hours each day were spent herding the guar, whom often wound up getting their oversized heads stuck in strange places. [PAWN_nameDef] also spent most afternoons crafting new pairs of boots, as [PAWN_possessive] boots were often ruined whilst wandering the fields.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: nix hound trainer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to own a quant little hovel in Hla Oad, where [PAWN_pronoun] spent many hours each day training nix hound pups. [PAWN_nameDef] quickly found out that [PAWN_pronoun] was quite good at this, and quickly earnt enough drakes to start a new life, outside of that awful swamp.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: ashlander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be an ashlander from the Ahemmusa Tribe. [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed living a relatively simple life, where death awaited around every corner. Though [PAWN_pronoun] eventually got sick of all the ash and blight storms, and decided to look for greener pastures, with actual grass.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: corprus refugee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced out of [PAWN_possessive] old home when the town was quarantined due to a corprus outbreak. [PAWN_nameDef] decided to help the other refugees, and learnt some useful skills on the road to Vivec.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: book shop owner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] owned a small bookshop in Vivec city, which specialised in selling rare books. One day the Ordinators visited [PAWN_possessive] shop, as they had heard certain heretical tomes were being sold there. Luckily [PAWN_nameDef] managed to escape before they arrived, though without a single drake to [PAWN_possessive] name.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: wandering poet
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Inspired by the wonderful tales told by Vivec, [PAWN_nameDef] became a wandering poet. [PAWN_nameDef]'s adventures were quite dull and uneventful, though the stories [PAWN_pronoun] told were anything but. Sadly, at the end of the day, [PAWN_possessive] tales were nothing compared to those told by Vivec, and [PAWN_pronoun] often had to cook dinner for [PAWN_possessive]self.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: chair crafter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] earned a living making and selling chairs, with the occasional table thrown in too. [PAWN_possessive] work even managed to catch the eye of a rather high ranking member of Great House Telvanni. One day [PAWN_nameDef] woke up, ready to fulfil the days orders, only to find every single chair, and table, missing.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: arena fighter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] frequently visited the arena in Vivec. In fact [PAWN_pronoun] spent many hours a day fighting in the pit, so many in fact that [PAWN_pronoun] had accrued quite the fanbase. Sadly all the blows to [PAWN_possessive] head has left a lasting impact.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: alchemist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was always willing to do anything to advance [PAWN_possessive] alchemical knowledge, even if it meant consuming somewhat... unconventional items. At the end of the day any pain [PAWN_nameDef] suffered was worth it, as the pouches of coin that accompanied fulfilled orders were quite heavy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: alchemist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was always willing to do anything to advance [PAWN_possessive] alchemical knowledge, even if it meant consuming somewhat... unconventional items. This willingness ended very abruptly one fateful day, when [PAWN_nameDef] bit down on a piece of Dwemer scrap metal.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: gardener
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the few tasked with caring for Mournhold's exotic flowers. A highly important job, as without [PAWN_nameDef], Mournhold wouldn't look nearly as nice.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: brewer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] oversaw a reasonably sized brewery in the Ascadian Isles. Many of the finest Dunmeri beverages were created there, all under [PAWN_nameDef]'s watchful eyes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: possessed
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] claims to be possessed by a vengeful ancestral spirit. This likely occurred during one of [PAWN_objective] frequent excursions to pilfer ancestral tombs, but [PAWN_nameDef] will never admit that.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: mercenary
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was quite knowledgeable when it came to the harsh lands of Vvardenfell, and knew how to deal with all the various dangers that could be encountered there. From bandits to cliff racers, if you needed protection while out in the ashen wastes, [PAWN_nameDef] was who you wanted to hire.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: skorati herder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] tended a small herd of skorati. Peaceful creatures, that [PAWN_pronoun] was rather fond of. As an extra bonus, [PAWN_nameDef] could create clothing out of skorati fur, which fetched a decent price in the nearby towns.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: bantam guar tender
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] thought it would be a good idea to earn a living selling bantam guar eggs. Turns out bantam guar, while quite small, are overflowing with attitude, and they didn't much care for [PAWN_nameDef]. Eventually [PAWN_pronoun] was forced out of [PAWN_possessive] own dwellings, by an angry horde of bantam guar. [PAWN_nameDef] occasionally still wakes up in a cold sweat.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kemel-Ze excavator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the many local excavators working in the Dwemer ruins of Kemel-Ze. Work there was hard, for one had to be extremely cautions of the surroundings, especially when members of the Imperial Archaeological Society were watching. But it was worth it, for the pouch of drakes [PAWN_nameDef] recieved at the end of each day was quite full.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kemel-Ze researcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was lucky enough to be allowed access to Kemel-Ze, thanks to a rather influential friend. The ruins were a truly marvellous spectacle, [PAWN_nameDef] could spend years in there, and still find new things to study. Of course [PAWN_pronoun] had a habit of getting in the way of the Imperial Archaeological Societies work, not that [PAWN_pronoun] really cared.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Arnesian War veteran
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the many Dunmer who fought in the Arnesian War. [PAWN_pronoun] was one of many who heroically stormed Black Marsh. And one of the few left standing in land now belonging to Morrowind. In later days, [PAWN_nameDef] took up gardening, but is still surprisingly quick on [PAWN_possessive] feet.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Arnesian War veteran
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the many Dunmer who fought in the Arnesian War. [PAWN_pronoun] was one of many who heroically stormed Black Marsh. And one of the few left standing in land now belonging to Morrowind, though not entirely in one piece. In later days, [PAWN_nameDef] took up pottery, but is still surprisingly quick on [PAWN_possessive] foot.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: drunkard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] claims to be a veteran of the Arnesian War. No one really believes [PAWN_objective], but occasionally someone takes pity, and gives [PAWN_objective] a few drakes. Those drakes are usually immediately spent on another bottle of sujamma, [PAWN_nameDef]'s favourite.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Vivec scaffolder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many tasked with assembling and disassembling scaffolding around Vivec City. This was a rather cushy job, as pay was good, and there was a decent amount of downtime between work. Although the near constant presence of Ordinators did make [PAWN_nameDef] somewhat uncomfortable.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: St. Delyn potter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Potter's Hall of the St. Delyn canton. Admittedly the pay wasn't great, but the bed was cheap, and [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed the work.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: St. Delyn glassworker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Glassworker's Hall of the St. Delyn canton. [PAWN_nameDef] was a bit annoyed when [PAWN_pronoun] realised they meant that kind of glass, but that did explain the pay, and [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't going to turn down the work.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: St. Olms tailor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Tailors and Dyers Hall of the St. Olms canton. Days were varied enough, some days shirts, other days pants, maybe even some gloves thrown in there. But [PAWN_nameDef] did eventually grow tired of it, and decided to move on.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: St. Olms dyer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Tailors and Dyers Hall of the St. Olms canton. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed working with all the dyes, in all their different colours, although there were a few colours [PAWN_nameDef] didn't much care for.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: St. Olms brewer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Brewers and Fishmongers Hall of the St. Olms canton. [PAWN_pronoun] always questioned why the brewers and fishmongers had to share a hall, what with the constant smell of fish tainting the alcohol.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: St. Olms fishmonger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Brewers and Fishmongers Hall of the St. Olms canton. [PAWN_nameDef] looked forward to every day, mostly because [PAWN_pronoun] always knew there was a jug of sujamma with [PAWN_possessive] name on it, just a few steps away.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: St. Olms tanner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Tanners and Miners Hall of the St. Olms canton. Tanning hides was tiring and monotonous work, but conversations with the miners helped [PAWN_nameDef] through each day. [PAWN_nameDef] even picked up a few tricks from them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: St. Olms miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Tanners and Miners Hall of the St. Olms canton. When [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't working tirelessly in the mines, [PAWN_pronoun] could be found in the Hall, tending to the counter, or sometimes sharing tips with the tanners.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: St. Olms farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Farmers and Labourers Hall of the St. Olms canton. While [PAWN_nameDef] occasionally helped out in the fields, most days were spent in the Hall itself, ensuring the shop was well stocked, and completing orders.
